Description of the Weapon Passive: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 20% ATK as DMG for 5s.
Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 4% HP every 2s for this duration.
On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 240% ATK DMG to enemies within a small radius. Can only occur once every 15s.
Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 36% for 10s.
On hit Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.
Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.
On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 16% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 6%.
After using an Elemental Skill receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume increasing ATK by 16% for 6s.
Charged Attack hits on opponents increase ATK by 16% for 6s.
Upon dealing damage to an opponent increases CRIT Rate by 3.2%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.
Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 16% and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by 6%.
After using an Elemental Skill Normal or Charged Attacks on hit, deal an additional 60% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.
On hit Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
On hit Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.
Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 12%.
Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 12%.
Increases DMG against slimes by 40%.
